articles.content: Here is Ron Howards decent retelling of an amazing true-life story: the Tham Luang cave rescue in northern Thailand in 2018, when international volunteers and Thai Navy Seals battled to rescue 12 tee… [+3143 chars]

articles.title: Britney Spears Leaked The Alarming Text Messages She Sent Her Mom, Friend, And Lawyer In 2019 When She Was Being Held In A Mental Health Facility Against Her Will - BuzzFeed News
articles.description: Britney claimed she got “no response” from her mom after expressing fear that her doctor was “trying to kill” her while she was being held at a mental health facility.
